jobInfo.postDescription:
Area of Responsibilities:
Master Data:
-	New creation and update master data into SAP.
-	Coordination with responsible depts. by problems appearing and solve them.
-	Export and create various reports.
-	Archive original hard and soft documents.
-	Maintain raw material overview.
-	Check and update duty list in PM tools.
Certification:
-	Enquiry Certificate/Test for new potential products.
-	Follow-up of fixed projects.
-	Control payment status to 3rd. Parties.
-	Maintain relevant overviews.
-	Check and update duty list in PM tools.
Undertake other tasks as requested by superiors

Person Specification：
1.	Skills / Competencies
∙ Be familiar with ERP e.g. SAP
∙ Careful, diligent, willing to learn.
∙ Honest, willing to take responsibility and team-work spirit.
∙ Good time management skill, including the ability to multitask and work under tight deadlines.
∙ Self-motivated, initiative and able to work well with minimal supervision.
∙ Good computer skills in Microsoft word, excel, outlook
2.	Leadership
∙ No supervisory responsibilities but provides informal guidance to new team members.
3.	Education
∙ College degree or above in a related field
4.	Experience
∙ More than 2 years working experience in multicultural company.
∙ At least 1 year work with ERP system
5.	Travel
∙ No
6.	Language
∙ Good command written English and oral English
jobInfo.address: 上海徐汇区钦州北路1122号92号楼1层

brandComInfo.introduce:
Einhell is a stock-listed, mid-sized power tools and garden tools trading company with a purchasing entity in China that cooperates with about 150 suppliers. The goods are sold in more than 40 countries by Einhell subsidiaries and partner companies.
Hans Einhell started in 1964 with the foundation of Hans Einhell Co., Ltd. in Landau/Isar in Germany, Hans Einhell changed to be Hans Einhell AG (EAG) in 1986 and listed on the stock exchange in 1987.
Einhell China (EC) was set up in 1994. China is the most important purchasing market for EAG, Einhell China set up the strong engineering Dept. to ensure products are made in strict compliance with Einhell quality guidelines and can be delivered to customers on time. 
In 2013 Einhell merged one company whose targeted market is in Australia with the brand name as Ozito. Since 1993 Ozito Industries has proudly helped home heroes nurture their passion for DIY. We provide a broad range of quality tools and garden products with industry leading warranties at affordable prices.	
To expand the business scope in China, we established a brand new manufacture plant in Kunshan, Suzhou, Jiangsu province in 2020.
